en: I was getting used to living in America.
zh: 我开始习惯住在美国了。

en: American politics are interesting to watch, especially during a presidential election.
zh: 美国的政治很有意思，尤其是在总统选举期间。

en: Is American food popular here in Japan?
zh: 美国食物在日本受欢迎吗？

en: Slaves are brought to the American colonies.
zh: 奴隶被带到美洲殖民地。

en: Compared with those in America, Japanese marriages rarely end in divorce.
zh: 与美国相比，日本的婚姻很少以离婚告终。

en: American women didn't have the right to vote.
zh: 美国女性过去没有选举权。

en: U.S. revisionists take a hard-line approach to Japanese relations.
zh: 美国修正主义者对日美关系采取强硬态度。

en: What is the capital of the United States?
zh: 美国的首都是什么？

en: American children grow up hearing those words.
zh: 美国的孩子从小就听到这些话。

en: I don't think I can cut in working in America.
zh: 我想我不能适应在美国工作。

en: American industry makes various attempts to find and encourage brilliant students from abroad.
zh: 美国工业界正在进行各种尝试，以寻找和鼓励来自国外的优秀学生。

en: Black people in America once said, "Give us freedom".
zh: 美国的黑人曾经说过：“给我们自由”。

en: The American people elected Mr. Clinton President.
zh: 美国人民选举克林顿先生为总统。

en: Many American high-school students do not know that the Civil War took place between 1861 and 1865.
zh: 许多美国高中生不知道内战发生在1861年至1865年之间。

en: The American police are in blue uniforms.
zh: 美国的警察穿着蓝色制服。

en: U.S. companies are working to find a niche in the Japanese economy.
zh: 美国公司正在努力在日本经济中找到一个利基市场。

en: American students are falling behind in math.
zh: 美国学生在数学方面正在落后。

en: Many American students work their way through the university.
zh: 许多美国学生靠打工来完成大学学业。

en: Athletic boys are popular with girls in American schools.
zh: 运动型男孩在美国学校很受女孩欢迎。

en: I've made up my mind to work for a company in the States.
zh: 我已经决定在美国的一家公司工作。

en: American songs were on the air.
zh: 广播里播放着美国歌曲。

en: The American home does away with most housework by using machines.
zh: 美国家庭通过使用机器来免除大部分家务劳动。

en: It was dark in the American house.
zh: 在美国的房子里很黑。

en: How does America impress you?
zh: 美国给你留下了什么印象？

en: I saw an American musical.
zh: 我看了美国音乐剧。

en: In U.S. bakeries, a "baker's dozen" is 13, not 12.
zh: 在美国的面包店里，“面包师的十三个”是13个，而不是12个。

en: American news stories always refer to "The Japanese" no matter who is being talked about.
zh: 美国新闻报道总是用“日本人”来指代，不管谈论的是谁。

en: American senior citizens are comparatively well-off.
zh: 美国的退休老人相对来说比较富裕。

en: If you decide to come to America, please let me know as soon as possible.
zh: 如果你决定来美国，请尽快告诉我。

en: I wonder what has become of him after he went to America.
zh: 我想知道他去了美国之后怎么样了。

en: You have to cross the ocean to get to America.
zh: 你必须跨越海洋才能到达美国。

en: He told me he was going to America.
zh: 他告诉我他要去美国。

en: There are many races in the United States.
zh: 美国有很多种族。

en: America has an elaborate system of constitutional checks and balances.
zh: 美国有一套精密的宪法制衡体系。

en: Several races live together in America.
zh: 美国居住着好几个种族。

en: There are fifty states in America.
zh: 美国有五十个州。

en: Laws to prevent computer crimes were enacted in the USA.
zh: 美国颁布了防止电脑犯罪的法律。

en: I had many problems during my visit to the U.S., but overall, I had a good time.
zh: 我在访问美国期间遇到了很多问题，但总的来说，我过得很愉快。

en: It would have been better if you had stayed in America.
zh: 如果你留在美国会更好。

en: I want to stay in America for a few years.
zh: 我想在美国待几年。

en: In America, rice can be bought for a fifth of what it costs in Japan.
zh: 在美国，买米的价格只有日本的五分之一。

en: The joint-venture between the American and Japanese companies fell through.
zh: 美国和日本公司之间的合资企业失败了。

en: I'm looking forward to touring bookstores in the US.
zh: 我期待着在美国参观书店。

en: In America cars drive on the right side of the road.
zh: 在美国，汽车靠右行驶。

en: What is the most popular sport in America?
zh: 美国最受欢迎的运动是什么？

en: In America, scores of free agents switch teams every year.
zh: 在美国，每年都有大量的自由球员转会。

en: In the U.S., it is common to give a present, such as glasses or a coffee-maker, to the bride at weddings.
zh: 在美国，婚礼上通常会送给新娘礼物，比如玻璃杯或咖啡机。

en: In the U.S., part of the application process to universities usually includes an essay on "Why I want to go to university."
zh: 在美国，大学申请过程的一部分通常包括一篇关于“我为什么想上大学”的文章。

en: Many couples in America both work to make ends meet.
zh: 在美国，许多夫妇都工作以维持生计。

en: In America, many people have fences around their homes.
zh: 在美国，许多人家的房子周围都有栅栏。

en: In the U.S., freedom of religion is one of the guarantees of the Bill of Rights.
zh: 在美国，宗教自由是权利法案的保障之一。

en: In the United States it is popular for girls to learn to skip rope.
zh: 在美国，女孩们很喜欢学跳绳。

en: Laws differ from state to state in the United States.
zh: 在美国，各州的法律各不相同。

en: In the U.S., you usually have to show identification in order to buy alcohol.
zh: 在美国，通常需要出示身份证才能购买酒精饮品。

en: In the United States the automobile is a necessity and not a luxury.
zh: 在美国，汽车是必需品，而不是奢侈品。

en: There are still some dry states in the U.S.
zh: 在美国仍然有一些禁酒州。

en: They speak English in America.
zh: 他们在美洲说英语。

en: In the U.S. I was often taken to be Chinese.
zh: 在美国，我经常被误认为是华人。

en: Bean sprouts are eaten as a salad in America.
zh: 在美国，豆芽被当作沙拉食用。

en: In the U.S., most people can vote when they reach eighteen years of age.
zh: 在美国，大多数人年满十八岁就可以投票。

en: No sport is as popular as football in America.
zh: 在美国，没有哪项运动比足球更受欢迎。

en: There are a great many forest fires in America.
zh: 在美国，有很多森林火灾。

en: Where are you going to stay in the States?
zh: 你打算在美国的哪个州待？

en: In American money, a "quarter" is 25 cents; 4 quarters make a dollar.
zh: 在美国货币中，“quarter”是25美分；4个quarter等于1美元。

en: In America elderly people are not given the same degree of respect they receive in many other countries.
zh: 在美国，老年人没有像在许多其他国家那样受到同等程度的尊重。

en: In the U.S., there are more prisoners than there is jail space for them. So the prisons are overcrowded.
zh: 在美国，囚犯比监狱空间还多。所以监狱人满为患。

en: While some private and church schools in America have uniforms, they are not common.
zh: 虽然美国的一些私立和教会学校有校服，但并不常见。

en: In America, my schedule is different and unique nearly every day.
zh: 在美国，我的日程安排几乎每天都不同且独特。

en: In the U.S., it is common for people to write a check instead of paying cash.
zh: 在美国，人们通常会写支票而不是支付现金。

en: In the United States, 20 million new jobs have been created during the past two decades, most of them in the service sector.
zh: 在美国，在过去的二十年中，已经创造了两千万个新的工作岗位，其中大部分在服务行业。

en: In the U.S., you have the option, when you enter a restaurant, to sit in the smoking or non-smoking section.
zh: 在美国，当你进入餐厅时，你可以选择坐在吸烟区或非吸烟区。

en: What's your business in the States?
zh: 你到美国做什么生意？

en: Every town in America has a library.
zh: 在美国，每个城镇都有一个图书馆。

en: There are roads and freeways wherever you go in America.
zh: 在美国，无论你走到哪里都有公路和高速公路。

en: Why do you think soccer isn't popular in the US?
zh: 你认为为什么足球在美国不流行？

en: Have you made much progress in English in America?
zh: 你在美国英语进步很大吗？

en: A student from America lives near my house.
zh: 我家附近住着一个来自美国的学生。

en: I will have graduated from college by the time you come back from America.
zh: 等你从美国回来的时候，我已经大学毕业了。

en: I'll get in touch with you as soon as I return from America.
zh: 我一从美国回来就和你联系。

en: We have received many orders from the U.S.
zh: 我们收到了很多来自美国的订单。

en: I understand you're visiting from America.
zh: 我知道你是从美国来的。

en: We captured cicadas with a net.
zh: 我们用网捕捉了蝉。

en: Don't get your dander up, but I have bad news to tell you.
zh: 你先别生气，我要告诉你一个坏消息。

en: Don't depend on your parents too much.
zh: 不要太依赖你的父母。

en: It wasn't a very interesting novel.
zh: 这不是一本很有趣的小说。

en: I hope this will not inconvenience you too much.
zh: 我希望这不会给你带来太多的不便。

en: Don't work yourself too hard.
zh: 不要工作太努力。

en: I felt so sleepy that I could hardly keep my eyes open.
zh: 我太困了，几乎睁不开眼睛。

en: Don't take things so seriously.
zh: 别把事情看得太重。

en: Don't take things too seriously.
zh: 别太当真。

en: Don't blow your own horn too much.
zh: 不要太自吹自擂。

en: Don't put much confidence in him.
zh: 不要对他抱太大的信心。

en: I don't see much of him.
zh: 我很少见到他。

en: I hope we don't have to wait for too long.
zh: 我希望我们不必等太久。

en: I had not waited long before he came.
zh: 我没等多久他就来了。

en: You don't look very well. You had better not go to work today.
zh: 你看上去不太好。你最好今天不要去上班。

en: I am hoarse from yelling so much.
zh: 我因为喊叫太多而声音嘶哑了。

en: A child is spoiled by too much attention.
zh: 孩子被过多的关注宠坏了。

en: I was surprised because it was very big.
zh: 我很惊讶，因为它非常大。

en: I had not waited long before he appeared.
zh: 我没等多久他就出现了。

en: He got so stout that his collar did not meet.
zh: 他胖得领子都合不上了。

en: Don't expect too much.
zh: 不要期望太高。

en: Don't be too dependent on others.
zh: 不要太依赖别人。

en: I experience nausea when I go on too many rides.
zh: 我玩太多游乐设施会感到恶心。

en: Don't rely too much on others.
zh: 不要太依赖别人。

en: Please don't walk too fast.
zh: 请不要走太快。

en: Don't lean too much on others.
zh: 不要太依靠别人。

en: Don't depend on other people too much.
zh: 不要太依赖别人。

en: Don't be so serious. It's only a game.
zh: 别太认真了，这只是个游戏。

en: I don't read newspapers much.
zh: 我不太看报纸。

en: Don't worry too much, or you'll go bald.
zh: 别太担心，否则你会秃头的。

en: Be sure not to eat too much.
zh: 千万不要吃太多。

en: It is too hot to work.
zh: 太热了，没法工作。

en: I didn't care about going out.
zh: 我不想出去。

en: It is dangerous to drink too much.
zh: 喝太多酒很危险。

en: I do not have much time.
zh: 我没有太多时间。

en: I don't have much time. Could you hurry?
zh: 我没有太多时间，你能快点吗？

en: I don't have much time.
zh: 我没有太多时间。

en: Don't be discouraged because you are not very talented.
zh: 不要因为你不是很聪明就灰心。

en: If you push yourself too hard, you'll make yourself ill.
zh: 如果你逼自己太紧，你会生病的。

en: I would like a less expensive double room.
zh: 我想要一间便宜一点的双人间。

en: Many a mother spoils her sons by not being strict enough.
zh: 很多母亲因为不够严格而溺爱儿子。

en: You don't look so hot.
zh: 你看上去不太好。

en: Not too well.
zh: 不太好。

en: Don't press your luck, kid.
zh: 别太得意忘形，小子。

en: There is not much hope.
zh: 希望不大。

en: Don't get your hopes up too much.
zh: 别抱太大希望。

en: It seems that you are not having a good time here.
zh: 看来你在这里过得不太愉快。

en: I had not gone far before I met him.
zh: 我没走多远就遇到他了。

en: We had not gone far before we were caught in a shower.
zh: 我们没走多远就遇上了一场阵雨。

en: I had not gone very far when I was caught in a shower.
zh: 我没走多远就遇上了一场阵雨。

en: It's too dark to play baseball now.
zh: 现在太黑了，没法打棒球了。

en: I don't watch a lot of movies, but I can't resist a good documentary.
zh: 我不怎么看电影，但好纪录片我可忍不住。

en: It's too dark to play tennis now.
zh: 现在太黑了，没法打网球了。

en: I feel tense and agitated when I have too much work to do.
zh: 工作太多的时候，我感到紧张和烦躁。

en: She was not a very good pianist.
zh: 她钢琴弹得不太好。

en: Such was her fright that she closed her eyes.
zh: 她吓坏了，以至于闭上了眼睛。

en: It was so hot that we couldn't walk for long.
zh: 天气太热了，我们没法走太久。

en: Because I was too busy.
zh: 因为我太忙了。

en: It's so difficult that I've decided to give up trying.
zh: 太难了，我决定放弃尝试。

en: If he is corrected too much, he will stop talking.
zh: 如果他被纠正得太多，他就会停止说话。

en: His muscles ached from sitting too long in one position.
zh: 因为长时间保持一个姿势坐着，他的肌肉酸痛。

en: I was worn out because I had to take care of so many children.
zh: 我累坏了，因为我不得不照顾很多孩子。

en: She shut her eyes because the light was so strong.
zh: 她闭上了眼睛，因为光线太强了。

en: Written too quickly, the letter had many mistakes.
zh: 这封信写得太快了，有很多错误。

en: It's too cold to go to the sea yet.
zh: 现在去海边还太冷了。

en: So friendly was his letter that she was deeply moved and began to cry.
zh: 他的信写得非常友善，她深受感动，开始哭泣。

en: If there are too many irons in the fire in too short a time, good strategy cannot result.
zh: 如果在太短的时间内同时处理太多的事情，就不会有好策略。

en: There was so much noise that the speaker couldn't make himself heard.
zh: 太吵了，演讲者没法让大家听到他的声音。

en: It rained so hard that the shrine was washed away.
zh: 雨下得太大了，神社都被冲走了。

en: So much has happened. It's as if the whole world is flipped upside down.
zh: 发生了太多事情，感觉整个世界都颠倒了。

en: You have changed so much that I can hardly recognize you.
zh: 你变化太大了，我都快认不出你了。

en: Being too nervous to reply, he stared at the floor.
zh: 他紧张得说不出话，只是盯着地板。

en: When you rely on the team too much, it may reduce your individual competitive instincts.
zh: 当你过度依赖团队时，可能会降低你的个人竞争意识。

en: He is apt to get angry if you ask a lot of questions.
zh: 如果你问太多问题，他很容易生气。

en: Don't boast too much about that.
zh: 不要太炫耀那件事。

en: Holding an eel too fast is the way to let her escape.
zh: 握鳗鱼握得太紧反而会让它逃脱。

en: Only if it's not too much trouble.
zh: 只要不太麻烦就行。

en: I was wondering if you could give me a lift, if it isn't too much trouble.
zh: 我想问你能不能载我一程，如果不太麻烦的话。

en: You shouldn't eat too much candy.
zh: 你不应该吃太多糖。

en: Don't make the perm too strong, please.
zh: 请不要把头发烫得太卷。

en: Don't spend too much money.
zh: 不要花太多钱。

en: As I do not have enough money, I will have to do without a new coat this winter.
zh: 因为我钱不够，今年冬天我只能不买新外套了。

en: The Amazon is the second longest river in the world after the Nile.
zh: 亚马逊河是世界第二长的河流，仅次于尼罗河。

en: The Amazon is fed by a large number of tributaries.
zh: 亚马逊河由大量的支流供水。

en: There are so-called primitive cultures in the jungles of the Amazon and on the island of New Guinea, and there are so-called advanced cultures in Europe, Asia, and Africa, but the languages of these cultures are all equally advanced and complex.
zh: 在亚马逊丛林和新几内亚岛上存在着所谓的原始文化，在欧洲、亚洲和非洲存在着所谓的先进文化，但这些文化的语言都同样先进和复杂。

en: I asked for an appointment, but he wouldn't spare me the time.
zh: 我要求和他见面，但他不肯抽出时间给我。

en: The Apollo program greatly advanced our knowledge of space.
zh: 阿波罗计划极大地增进了我们对太空的了解。

en: A report came in that Apollo 11 succeeded in landing on the moon.
zh: 有报告称阿波罗11号成功登月。

en: The sun was shining in all its splendid beauty.
zh: 太阳光芒四射，美丽极了。

en: It isn't surprising that Africans may think of English as one of their continent's languages.
zh: 非洲人认为英语是他们非洲大陆的语言之一，这并不奇怪。

en: Africa is a continent; Greenland is not.
zh: 非洲是一个大陆；格陵兰不是。

en: Africa is a continent, but Greenland is not.
zh: 非洲是一个大陆，但格陵兰不是。

en: Africa is exporting beef to Europe.
zh: 非洲正在向欧洲出口牛肉。

en: Africa was once called the Dark Continent.
zh: 非洲曾经被称为黑暗大陆。

en: Refugees in Africa are seeking help.
zh: 非洲的难民正在寻求帮助。

en: My heart aches for the starving children in Africa.
zh: 我为非洲那些挨饿的孩子们感到心痛。

en: Have you ever been to Africa?
zh: 你去过非洲吗？

en: Africa has a lot of nature.
zh: 非洲有很多自然风光。

en: Those who are suffering from hunger in Africa need urgent help.
zh: 非洲那些遭受饥饿的人们需要紧急援助。

en: My year in Africa was a very educational experience in many ways.
zh: 我在非洲的那一年在很多方面都非常有教育意义。

en: Many people in Africa were killed as a result of the storm.
zh: 许多非洲人在风暴中丧生。

en: A lot of people in Africa go hungry.
zh: 非洲有很多人挨饿。

en: Many children die of starvation in Africa.
zh: 许多儿童在非洲死于饥饿。

en: They have had no rain in Africa for more than a month.
zh: 非洲已经一个多月没有下雨了。

en: Abraham Lincoln's father was a carpenter by trade.
zh: 亚伯拉罕·林肯的父亲以木匠为业。

en: I don't want to go out on a limb.
zh: 我不想冒险。

en: They're some developers who aim to make a fast buck!
zh: 有些开发商只想快速赚钱！

en: Ducks were swimming about on the pond.
zh: 鸭子在池塘里游来游去。

en: It looks like a duck.
zh: 它看起来像只鸭子。

en: What's a loon?
zh: 什么是潜鸟？

en: Can you tell a duck from a goose?
zh: 你能分辨鸭子和鹅吗？

en: Did you rent an apartment?
zh: 你租了公寓吗？

en: We soon agreed on a rent for the apartment.
zh: 我们很快就公寓的租金达成了一致。

en: You don't have to pay for an apartment in advance.
zh: 你不需要提前支付公寓的租金。

en: How much rent do you pay for the apartment?
zh: 你公寓的租金是多少？

en: The flat is on fire.
zh: 公寓着火了。

en: What have you done with that wristwatch?
zh: 你把那块手表弄到哪里去了？

en: The talented young chess player is very bold. He deliberately lays himself open to attack, makes himself vulnerable and then checkmates his opponent when least expected.
zh: 那位才华横溢的年轻棋手非常大胆。他故意让自己暴露在攻击之下，让自己变得脆弱，然后在对手最意想不到的时候将他将死。

en: That story can be true.
zh: 那个故事可能是真的。

en: The story was a two-faced lie that she told you to make you angry with me.
zh: 她跟你说那个故事就是个两面派的谎言，目的是让你生我的气。

en: That story is too incredible to be true.
zh: 那个故事太离奇了，不太可能是真的。

en: That way of speaking is peculiar to people in this part of the country.
zh: 那种说话方式是这个地方的人特有的。

en: That old man must be off his rock.
zh: 那个老头一定是脑子有问题。

en: Who is that old woman?
zh: 那个老太太是谁？

en: That old man is a fussy eater.
zh: 那个老头很挑食。

en: The old man had been making white lightning for 50 years.
zh: 那个老头已经酿了50年的私酒了。

en: The old men like to meet on the street corner just to shoot the bull.
zh: 那些老头喜欢在街角碰面，只是为了闲聊。

en: They got the sack for being careless and tardy.
zh: 他们因为粗心和迟到而被解雇了。

en: You must steer clear of that gang.
zh: 你必须远离那个团伙。

en: The hotel has a homey atmosphere.
zh: 这家酒店有温馨的氛围。

en: How did you come by that fine gold watch?
zh: 你从哪里弄来的那块漂亮的金表？

en: Look at that shooting star.
zh: 看那颗流星。

en: How can I get rid of all those fallen leaves?
zh: 我怎样才能清除掉所有那些落叶？

en: Those officials don't understand finance at all.
zh: 那些官员根本不懂金融。

en: I am going to get that sucker.
zh: 我要收拾那个家伙。

en: I only asked her what she paid for that dull-looking dress and she flew off the handle at me.
zh: 我只是问她那件看起来很普通的裙子花了多少钱，她就对我大发雷霆。

en: How did you deal with the matter?
zh: 你是如何处理这件事的？

en: There were a lot of twists and turns to the story, but we finally solved the problem.
zh: 这个故事有很多曲折，但我们最终解决了问题。

en: That problem has really got me.
zh: 那个问题真让我头疼。

en: I'll bet that I can beat you to the tree.
zh: 我敢打赌我能比你先跑到那棵树。

en: That tree is not so tall as this.
zh: 那棵树没有这棵高。

en: Some birds are sitting on the branch of that tree.
zh: 有些鸟儿正栖息在那棵树的树枝上。

en: The young woman under that tree looks sad.
zh: 那棵树下的年轻女子看起来很悲伤。

en: Let's sit down in the shade of that tree.
zh: 我们到那棵树的树荫下坐一会儿吧。

en: Look at the top of that tree.
zh: 看看那棵树的顶端。

en: Who was that troublesome man?
zh: 那个惹麻烦的男人是谁？

en: I wonder what happened to that lost child.
zh: 我想知道那个走失的孩子怎么样了。

en: What do those lights signify?
zh: 那些灯光代表什么？

en: She knows she's looking fine.
zh: 她知道她看起来很漂亮。

en: She looks pretty no matter what she wears.
zh: 她穿什么都好看。

en: She isn't so against the idea.
zh: 她并没有那么反对这个想法。

en: Somebody should tell off that rude man.
zh: 应该有人训斥一下那个粗鲁的男人。

en: I can't abide that rude man.
zh: 我无法忍受那个粗鲁的男人。

en: That inn is 5,000 yen a night, meals excluded.
zh: 那家旅馆一晚5000日元，不含餐费。

en: That translation is said to be true to the original.
zh: 据说那个翻译忠于原文。

en: I found the book at that bookstore by chance.
zh: 我偶然在那家书店找到了那本书。

en: Give that book back to me.
zh: 把那本书还给我。

en: I'll keep that book for myself.
zh: 我会把那本书留给自己。

en: Put that book aside for me.
zh: 把那本书为我放在一边。

en: That book is worth reading.
zh: 那本书值得一读。

en: Whose is that book?
zh: 那本书是谁的？

en: That book is a new book.
zh: 那本书是一本新书。

en: That book is of no use.
zh: 那本书毫无用处。

en: I have read that book several times.
zh: 我已经读过那本书好几遍了。

en: What did you do with those books?
zh: 你把那些书怎么样了？

en: The readers of that book think themselves sophisticated.
zh: 那本书的读者自认为很世故。

en: Cows abound on that farm.
zh: 那个农场里有很多牛。

en: I am very pleased to meet them.
zh: 我很高兴见到他们。

en: She's our teacher.
zh: 她是我们的老师。

en: It is regrettable that she should have died so young.
zh: 她这么年轻就去世了，真是太可惜了。

en: Are you the writer of that report?
zh: 你是那份报告的作者吗？

en: That room is not very large.
zh: 那个房间不是很大。

en: It is dark in that room.
zh: 那个房间里很暗。

en: There are plenty of guests in the room.
zh: 房间里有很多客人。

en: You may smoke in that room, but you mustn't smoke in this room.
zh: 你可以在那个房间里抽烟，但是你不能在这个房间里抽烟。

en: That lady is haughty to a great degree.
zh: 那位女士非常傲慢。

en: How many maids does that lady want to employ?
zh: 那位女士想雇多少个女佣？

en: That lady appears rich.
zh: 那位女士看起来很有钱。

en: The lady is forty years old at most.
zh: 那位女士最多四十岁。

en: That woman stays young.
zh: 那个女人保持年轻。

en: They are not a well-matched couple.
zh: 他们不是一对般配的夫妻。

en: He and his wife both work and his salary is lower than hers, so no wonder he is a hen-pecked husband.
zh: 他和他的妻子都工作，他的工资比她低，难怪他是个妻管严。

en: You need an appointment for that hospital.
zh: 去那家医院需要预约。

en: They say there's a Picasso and three Renoirs in that museum.
zh: 据说那个博物馆里有一幅毕加索和三幅雷诺阿的画。

en: Look at that lovely house of Mary's.
zh: 看看玛丽那栋漂亮的房子。

en: The beautiful scene comes to my mind.
zh: 美丽的景色浮现在我的脑海中。

en: How huge that airship is!
zh: 那个飞艇真大啊！

en: That plane is so ugly.
zh: 那架飞机真丑。

en: That airplane was not able to depart at the regular time.
zh: 那架飞机未能按时起飞。

en: That plane will take off at five.
zh: 那架飞机将在五点起飞。

en: If I had taken that plane, I would be dead now.
zh: 如果我坐了那架飞机，我现在就死了。

en: Look at that flying bird.
zh: 看看那只飞鸟。

en: That tragedy was etched in my mind.
zh: 那场悲剧深深地印在我的脑海里。

en: That picture does not do justice to him.
zh: 那张照片没有把他拍好。

en: That man who committed that crime was out of his mind.
zh: 那个犯下罪行的男人一定是疯了。

en: That box is made of wood.
zh: 那个盒子是木头做的。

en: That box is too small to hold all these things.
zh: 那个盒子太小了，装不下所有的东西。

en: That box is bigger than this one.
zh: 那个盒子比这个大。

en: That white building is a hospital.
zh: 那栋白色的建筑是医院。

en: Why not try some of that white wine?
zh: 为什么不尝尝那种白葡萄酒呢？

en: The white building was destroyed by the earthquake.
zh: 那栋白色的建筑被地震摧毁了。

en: What's that tall man playing?
zh: 那个高个子男人在玩什么？

en: That tall man is Mr Smith.
zh: 那个高个子男人是史密斯先生。

en: That tall boy saved the drowning child.
zh: 那个高个子男孩救了那个溺水的孩子。

en: That actor is both handsome and skillful.
zh: 那个演员既英俊又有才华。

en: I can't stand that silly woman.
zh: 我受不了那个愚蠢的女人。

en: How fast that horse runs!
zh: 那匹马跑得真快！

en: That horse may be a good bet.
zh: 那匹马可能是一个不错的赌注。

en: Look at the cat.
zh: 看看那只猫。

en: Look at that cat. It is Mr Brown's.
zh: 看看那只猫。那是布朗先生的。

en: That cat has beautiful fur.
zh: 那只猫有漂亮的毛皮。

en: You know times have changed when rivals like Hitachi and NEC get together.
zh: 当像日立和NEC这样的竞争对手走到一起时，你就知道时代变了。

en: She was the last person I expected to meet that day.
zh: 她是那天我最不希望见到的人。

en: It was a full moon that was seen that day.
zh: 那天看到的是满月。

en: It is because the physical condition was bad that it returned that day.
zh: 那天回来是因为身体状况不好。

en: There was a strong wind that day.
zh: 那天刮着强风。

en: That day I ate lunch there.
zh: 那天我在那里吃了午饭。

en: Those two are exactly alike.
zh: 那两个人一模一样。

en: It looks like they have made up again.
zh: 看起来他们又和好了。

en: They are too close.
zh: 他们靠得太近了。

en: They seem to be in love with each other.
zh: 他们看起来彼此相爱。

en: Those two boys share the same dormitory room.
zh: 那两个男孩住在同一间宿舍。

en: Those two runners were head to head right up till the finals in the Olympics.
zh: 那两名赛跑运动员在奥运会上一直并驾齐驱，直到决赛。

en: Are those two going out?
zh: 他们俩在交往吗？

en: That hard working boy is bound to succeed.
zh: 那个努力的男孩注定会成功。

en: I was badly in need of his help at that time.
zh: 当时我非常需要他的帮助。

en: Somehow the pitcher always proves a tough customer to me.
zh: 不知何故，那个投手对我来说总是很难对付。

en: Seen from a plane, that island is very beautiful.
zh: 从飞机上看，那个岛屿非常美丽。

en: That island has a tropical climate.
zh: 那个岛屿是热带气候。

en: That island is American territory.
zh: 那个岛屿是美国的领土。

en: How high is that tower?
zh: 那座塔有多高？

en: The clock on that tower is accurate.
zh: 那座塔上的钟很准。

en: That party is always pandering to the middle class.
zh: 那个政党总是迎合中产阶级。

en: If you touch that wire, you'll get a shock.
zh: 如果你碰到那根电线，你会触电的。

en: They deal in rice at that store.
zh: 那家商店经营大米。

en: That store sells a lot of imported goods.
zh: 那家商店出售很多进口商品。

en: That's a cheap store.
zh: 那是一家廉价商店。

en: That store sells men's wear.
zh: 那家商店卖男装。

en: That store sells a wide range of goods.
zh: 那家商店出售各种各样的商品。

en: That shop is a hamburger shop.
zh: 那家店是一家汉堡店。

en: That store gives good service.
zh: 那家商店提供良好的服务。

en: Have you tried that store?
zh: 你去过那家商店吗？

en: That store employs eight clerks.
zh: 那家商店雇佣了八名店员。

en: Does that store keep textile goods?
zh: 那家商店有纺织品吗？

en: There were no hats in that store that fit me.
zh: 那家店里没有我能戴的帽子。

en: A beautiful salesgirl waited on me in the shop.
zh: 一位漂亮的售货员在那家店里接待了我。

en: I came across him in that store.
zh: 我在那家店里偶然遇到了他。

en: They sell imports at that store.
zh: 那家店卖进口货。

en: They sell good foods at that shop.
zh: 那家店卖很好的食物。

en: They sell meat at that store.
zh: 那家店卖肉。

en: That store sells newspapers and magazines.
zh: 那家店卖报纸和杂志。

en: They mark down goods at that shop.
zh: 那家店对商品降价销售。

en: They sell sugar and salt at that store.
zh: 那家店卖糖和盐。

en: The store is having a sale on summer goods.
zh: 这家店正在夏季商品打折。

en: They sell shoes at that store.
zh: 那家店卖鞋。

en: They deal in fruit and vegetables at that store.
zh: 那家店经营水果和蔬菜。

en: That store sells many things besides furniture.
zh: 那家店除了家具还卖很多东西。

en: There is nothing to be had at that store.
zh: 那家店没什么好买的。

en: That store no longer sells cosmetics.
zh: 那家店不再卖化妆品了。

en: Do they sell bread at that store?
zh: 那家店卖面包吗？

en: They serve a very good dinner at that restaurant.
zh: 那家餐厅的晚餐非常好吃。

en: Everything at that store is 10 percent off the regular price.
zh: 那家店的所有商品都在原价基础上打九折。

en: They sell various kinds of goods at that store.
zh: 那家店卖各种各样的商品。

en: Do they sell notebooks at that store?
zh: 那家店卖笔记本吗？

en: I had my camera repaired at that shop.
zh: 我在那家店里修理了我的相机。

en: They short-changed me at that store.
zh: 那家店少找了我钱。

en: There are some nice apples on sale in that shop.
zh: 那家店里有一些不错的苹果在出售。

en: I wonder if that restaurant accepts unfamiliar customers.
zh: 我想知道那家餐厅是否接受不熟悉的顾客。

en: Change buses at that stop.
zh: 在那一站换乘公交车。

en: That interpreter is a master of five languages.
zh: 那位口译员精通五种语言。

en: That bird is now in danger of dying out.
zh: 那种鸟现在有绝种的危险。

en: That long-haired youth is rude.
zh: 那个留长发的年轻人很粗鲁。

en: Those birds build their nests in the summer and fly to the south in the winter.
zh: 那些鸟夏天筑巢，冬天飞往南方。

en: Is that long chimney broken?
zh: 那个长烟囱坏了吗？

en: There is a telephone booth at the corner of the street.
zh: 街角有一个电话亭。

en: Do those insects sting?
zh: 那些昆虫会蜇人吗？

en: That building whose roof is brown is a church.
zh: 那栋屋顶是棕色的建筑物是教堂。

en: That brown one is mine, too.
zh: 那个棕色的也是我的。

en: Keep away from that pond, please.
zh: 请远离那个池塘。

en: When the earthquake occurred, I happened to be watching TV.
zh: 地震发生时，我碰巧在看电视。

en: That landslide produced a lot of misery.
zh: 那次山崩造成了很多痛苦。

en: Don't go into that area.
zh: 不要进入那个区域。

en: He came on board this company with a lot of fanfare and he turns out to have the skill and talent to live up to it.
zh: 他大张旗鼓地加入了这家公司，结果证明他有能力和天赋不负众望。

en: Who is that man?
zh: 那个人是谁？

en: You might as well reason with the wolf as try to persuade that man.
zh: 你和那个人讲道理，简直就是与狼为伍。

en: I outwitted him.
zh: 我胜过了他。

en: Keep watch on that man.
zh: 盯住那个人。

en: She said that the mere sight of him made her sick.
zh: 她说仅仅看到他，就让她感到恶心。

en: That man was reduced to begging for money.
zh: 那个人沦落到乞讨的地步。

en: He is done for.
zh: 他完蛋了。

en: He is capable of treachery.
zh: 他有背叛的可能。

en: He has an unpleasant look in his eyes.
zh: 他的眼神令人不快。

en: That man is Perry Mason, the lawyer.
zh: 那个人是律师佩里·梅森。

en: That man is an egotist through and through.
zh: 那个人彻头彻尾是个自我主义者。

en: We believe he will succeed, for he has talent.
zh: 我们相信他会成功的，因为他有天赋。

en: The man answers to the description in the newspaper.
zh: 这个人符合报纸上的描述。

en: That man knows how to get on the president's good side.
zh: 那个人知道如何讨好总统。

en: That man can not so much as write his name.
zh: 那个人甚至连自己的名字都不会写。

en: That man is, so to speak, a grown-up boy.
zh: 那个人，可以这么说，是个长不大的孩子。

en: That man died of lung cancer a week ago.
zh: 那个人一周前死于肺癌。

en: He often uses the slightest thing as a pretext for a fight with anybody.
zh: 他经常以最微不足道的事情为借口与任何人争吵。

en: He is too ready to speak.
zh: 他太爱说话了。

en: The man is apparently deceiving us.
zh: 那个人显然在欺骗我们。

en: That man sometimes talks nonsense.
zh: 那个人有时会胡说八道。

en: That guy is walking pigeon-toed.
zh: 那家伙走路外八字。

en: That man borrows money from many lenders.
zh: 那个人向很多债权人借钱。

en: Shut that boy up.
zh: 让那个男孩闭嘴。

en: That boy takes after his father.
zh: 那个男孩像他爸爸。

en: Who is that boy?
zh: 那个男孩是谁？

en: He is a most clever boy.
zh: 他是个非常聪明的男孩。

en: I can't make out what the man is saying.
zh: 我听不清楚那个人在说什么。

en: The lady that is speaking to that boy is his teacher.
zh: 正在和那个男孩说话的女士是他的老师。

en: It is no use asking a favor of that man.
zh: 向那个人请求帮助是没有用的。

en: What he lacks is courage.
zh: 他缺乏的是勇气。

en: Watch out for that man.
zh: 小心那个人。

en: I like that man all the better for his faults.
zh: 我越发喜欢那个人的缺点。

en: I cannot abide him.
zh: 我无法容忍他。

en: I do not put my complete confidence in him.
zh: 我没有完全信任他。

en: He is not the only pebble on the beach.
zh: 他不是唯一的人才/选择。

en: Although I was angry at the man for his rudeness, I held my tongue.
zh: 虽然我很生气那个人的粗鲁无礼，但我还是忍住了没说话。

en: If that man makes one more mistake, I'll fire him.
zh: 如果那个人再犯一个错误，我就解雇他。

en: Was that word appropriate in that situation?
zh: 那个词在那种情况下合适吗？

en: We cannot tell how much that great statesman has done for his country.
zh: 我们无法估量那位伟大的政治家为他的国家做了多少贡献。

en: The tycoon endowed each son with a million dollars.
zh: 那位大亨给每个儿子捐赠了一百万美元。

en: That university was my first choice.
zh: 那所大学是我的第一选择。

en: That university conducts its entrance examinations using a computer scored answer sheet.
zh: 那所大学使用电脑阅卷的答题卡进行入学考试。

en: That big boy is bullying the little children.
zh: 那个大男孩正在欺负小孩子们。

en: I can't put up with that loud noise.
zh: 我受不了那么大的噪音。

en: Look at the monkey on that bough.
zh: 看看那根树枝上的猴子。

en: Look at that big dog.
zh: 看看那只大狗。

en: Look at that big hammer.
zh: 看看那个大锤子。

en: That big one is also mine.
zh: 那个大的也是我的。

en: I have to tell him off for his bad attitude.
zh: 我得好好训斥他一下，他的态度太差了。

en: I can not stand that noise.
zh: 我受不了那个噪音。

en: I can't abide that noise.
zh: 我无法忍受那个噪音。

en: I can't endure that noise a moment longer.
zh: 我再也无法忍受那个噪音了。

en: Would you be so kind as to shut that window?
zh: 您能好心关一下那扇窗户吗？

en: Look at that boy running.
zh: 看看那个正在跑的男孩。

en: Don't use the desk by that window.
zh: 不要用靠窗户的那张桌子。

en: Those twins look like two peas in a pod.
zh: 那些双胞胎长得一模一样。

en: Everyone is anxious to know what has become of the former champion.
zh: 每个人都迫切想知道那位前冠军怎么样了。

en: The contestant made two false starts.
zh: 那位选手抢跑了两次。

en: That ship goes abroad from this port.
zh: 那艘船从这个港口驶往国外。

en: He was living in England when the war broke out.
zh: 战争爆发时，他住在英国。

en: That river is dangerous to swim in.
zh: 那条河游泳很危险。

en: I think it's dangerous to swim in that river.
zh: 我觉得在那条河里游泳很危险。

en: The executive director is a real pushover for looks.
zh: 那位执行董事真是个容易被外貌迷惑的人。

en: The teacher handles his pupils well.
zh: 那位老师很会管教他的学生。

en: That fortune-teller is no better than a liar.
zh: 那个算命先生跟骗子没什么两样。

en: That Prof.'s talk is driving me up the wall.
zh: 那位教授的讲座快把我逼疯了。

en: His lectures are terribly boring.
zh: 他的讲座非常无聊。

en: You may ask a question of that teacher.
zh: 你可以向那位老师提问。

en: That teacher tends to be partial to female students.
zh: 那位老师往往偏袒女学生。

en: For him a doctor to get lung cancer from smoking - it's a typical case of 'Do as I say not as I do.'
zh: 对他来说，医生因为吸烟得了肺癌，这真是典型的“只许州官放火，不许百姓点灯”。

en: It is a pity that the teacher is leaving our school.
zh: 那位老师要离开我们学校，真是太可惜了。

en: We all agree in liking the teacher.
zh: 我们都一致喜欢那位老师。

en: Look at that mountain which is covered with snow.
zh: 看看那座被雪覆盖的山。

en: That baby has charming eyes.
zh: 那个婴儿有一双迷人的眼睛。

en: That baby is fat and healthy.
zh: 那个婴儿又胖又健康。

en: I can truly say that baby is ugly.
zh: 我可以实话实说，那个婴儿真丑。

en: That baby will have slept five hours by noon.
zh: 到中午，那个婴儿将会睡了五个小时。

en: Look at that red building.
zh: 看看那栋红色的建筑。

en: That red tie doesn't go with your suit. Why don't you wear the green one?
zh: 那条红色领带和你的西装不搭。你为什么不戴绿色的那条呢？

en: That red dress becomes her.
zh: 那件红色的连衣裙很适合她。

en: That red sweater looks good on you.
zh: 那件红色毛衣你穿起来很好看。

en: That blue-white shining star is Sirius.
zh: 那颗蓝白色的闪亮星星是天狼星。

en: The young man was extremely money hungry.
zh: 那个年轻人非常贪财。

en: Please look at the girl who wore the blue clothes.
zh: 请看看那个穿蓝色衣服的女孩。

en: That blue one is also mine.
zh: 那个蓝色的也是我的。

en: That student is Tom.
zh: 那个学生是汤姆。

en: That politician is full of ambition.
zh: 那个政客野心勃勃。

en: That politician is well versed in internal and external conditions.
zh: 那个政客精通国内外情况。

en: The politician receives on Wednesdays.
zh: 那个政客在星期三接见访客。

en: That politician is by no means honest.
zh: 那个政客绝不诚实。

en: That politician is an old fox.
zh: 那个政客是个老狐狸。

en: That politician has come down in the world since the so-called "Recruit scandal" was publicized.
zh: 自从所谓的“招聘丑闻”被公开后，那个政客就一落千丈了。

en: The politician is as slippery as an eel!
zh: 那个政客像泥鳅一样滑头！

en: That politician won't meet you unless you grease his palm.
zh: 你不给他好处，那个政客是不会见你的。

en: What that politician said is not at all true.
zh: 那个政客说的话根本不是真的。

en: That swimsuit looks really good on you.
zh: 那件泳衣你穿起来真好看。

en: I don't feel well after drinking that water.
zh: 喝了那水后，我觉得不舒服。

en: Driving through that snowstorm was a nightmare.
zh: 在暴风雪中开车简直是场噩梦。

en: Have you any idea who he is?
zh: 你知道他是谁吗？

en: They are weary of their tedious work.
zh: 他们厌倦了他们那乏味的工作。

en: They have been working on the new building.
zh: 他们一直在建造那栋新楼。

en: They must have suspected me of stealing.
zh: 他们一定怀疑我偷东西了。

en: What do they deal in?
zh: 他们经营什么？

en: They indulged in mahjong.
zh: 他们沉迷于麻将。

en: You can rely on their coming on time.
zh: 你可以指望他们准时到达。

en: You can't count on their help.
zh: 你不能指望他们的帮助。

en: It'll be useless to stand against them.
zh: 和他们作对是没用的。

en: They are free from care and anxiety.
zh: 他们无忧无虑。

en: He's going to have a heart attack.
zh: 他要犯心脏病了。

en: I hear that popular group will be disbanded.
zh: 我听说那个受欢迎的组合要解散了。

en: He thinks me unkind, too.
zh: 他认为我也很不友善。

en: He is not very fast at making friends.
zh: 他不擅长交朋友。

en: Is she all right?
zh: 她没事吧？

en: He is delightful.
zh: 他真讨人喜欢。

en: He is an authority on physics.
zh: 他是物理学方面的权威。

en: He is a saint of a man.
zh: 他真是个圣人。

en: He is hard to deal with.
zh: 他很难相处。

en: He's the man that was here last week.
zh: 他就是上周来这里的那个人。

en: He is sixty, if a day.
zh: 他肯定有六十岁了。

en: People say she was an actress when she was young.
zh: 人们说她年轻的时候是个演员。

en: He is not really a friend, just an acquaintance.
zh: 他不算真正的朋友，只是个熟人。

en: It seems that he believes what he said is right.
zh: 看来他相信他所说的是对的。

en: That man is in love with my sister.
zh: 那个人爱上了我的妹妹。

en: He is watching my every move.
zh: 他正监视我的一举一动。

en: He was critical of me.
zh: 他批评了我。

en: He seems very hard on me, but he is really a very kind man.
zh: 他表面上对我非常严厉，但实际上他是个非常善良的人。

en: He might be our new teacher.
zh: 他可能是我们的新老师。

en: He is our boss, and must be treated as such.
zh: 他是我们的老板，必须以对待老板的方式对待他。

en: That's the man I've been waiting for a week.
zh: 他就是我等了一个星期的人。

en: He is only a passing chance acquaintance.
zh: 他只是个萍水相逢的熟人。

en: He says one thing and means another.
zh: 他口是心非。

en: He is a cheerful old man.
zh: 他是个快乐的老人。

en: I know him by name, but not by sight.
zh: 我只知道他的名字，没见过他本人。

en: That person has a mole at the side of his eye.
zh: 那个人眼睛旁边有颗痣。

en: How is he getting along with his school work?
zh: 他的学业进展如何？

en: I feel awkward in his presence.
zh: 和他在一起我感到很不自在。

en: He is always in the background.
zh: 他总是默默无闻。

en: He is a doctor and a university professor.
zh: 他既是医生又是大学教授。

en: He may be a good man for all I know.
zh: 就我所知，他可能是一个好人。

en: That man bows to me as if he knew me.
zh: 那个人向我鞠躬，好像他认识我一样。

en: He is a man of striking individuality.
zh: 他是一个个性鲜明的人。

en: She remained my best friend till her dying day.
zh: 直到她去世那天，她仍然是我最好的朋友。

en: Tell me what that man is like.
zh: 告诉我那个人怎么样。

en: He must be Tom's brother.
zh: 他一定是汤姆的兄弟。

en: How long is he going to stay in Japan?
zh: 他打算在日本待多久？

en: He makes a bad impression.
zh: 他给人的印象不好。

en: He's a man who doesn't make mistakes.
zh: 他是一个不会犯错的人。

en: He easily gets angry.
zh: 他很容易生气。

en: He's been a patron of this store for many years.
zh: 他多年来一直是这家店的顾客。

en: That person will be read out of our club.
zh: 那个人将被我们俱乐部除名。

en: She looks young because of her makeup, but she is already more than forty years old.
zh: 她因为化妆看起来很年轻，但她已经四十多岁了。

en: He is a man who can always be trusted.
zh: 他是一个可以永远信任的人。

en: Nothing has been heard from him since he left for America.
zh: 自从他去美国后，就再也没有他的消息了。

en: He doesn't have long to live.
zh: 他活不长了。

en: That man is too boastful for my liking.
zh: 我不喜欢那个人太爱吹牛。

en: He is far from suitable for that job.
zh: 他根本不适合那份工作。

en: Will he be able to come tomorrow?
zh: 他明天能来吗？

en: Don't worry. He may look intimidating at first glance, but he's actually a very friendly person.
zh: 别担心。他乍一看可能很吓人，但实际上他是一个非常友善的人。

en: He had the impudence to cut across our garden.
zh: 他竟然厚颜无耻地穿过我们的花园。

en: Her daughter is bad at cooking.
zh: 她的女儿不擅长做饭。

en: I was distrustful of his motives.
zh: 我不信任他的动机。

en: I can't hold up my head before him.
zh: 我没脸见他。

en: Although the man's ideas are sound, because he can't express them well, he doesn't have a ghost of a chance of getting them accepted.
zh: 虽然那个人的想法很好，但是因为他表达不好，所以他根本不可能被接受。

en: I cannot place confidence in his words.
zh: 我不能相信他的话。

en: Something in his face really reminded me of an old boyfriend of mine.
zh: 他脸上的某些东西真的让我想起了我的一个前男友。

en: His singing outdoes a professional.
zh: 他唱得比专业人士还好。

en: His house is near the subway.
zh: 他的房子在地铁附近。

en: His wife speaks Spanish as well as English.
zh: 他的妻子说西班牙语和英语一样好。

en: People notice every move he makes.
zh: 人们注意到他的一举一动。

en: He is not much to look at, I guess.
zh: 我想他长得不怎么样。

en: Shall I buy some for him?
zh: 我给他买一些好吗？

en: Let's ask him.
zh: 我们问问他吧。

en: I'm not about to ask him.
zh: 我才不会问他呢。

en: I'm rather hesitant about asking him a favor.
zh: 我很犹豫要不要请他帮忙。

en: Do you know if he has a girlfriend?
zh: 你知道他有没有女朋友吗？

en: He has knowledge, and experience as well.
zh: 他既有知识，也有经验。

en: I remember meeting that man at Cambridge before.
zh: 我记得以前在剑桥见过那个人。

en: I am too amazed at him to say anything.
zh: 我太惊讶了，说不出话来。

en: I haven't met him properly yet.
zh: 我还没有正式见过他。

en: It will be rather difficult for him.
zh: 对他来说会相当困难。

en: There were some unsavory rumors about him.
zh: 有一些关于他的不好的传闻。

en: I suggest that you should write him a thank-you letter.
zh: 我建议你应该给他写一封感谢信。

en: I am sick and tired of him.
zh: 我对他感到厌烦透顶。

en: It's easy for that man to compose a good poem.
zh: 那个人很容易就能写出一首好诗。

en: You're better off not getting in his way!
zh: 你最好别挡他的道！

en: I lent him some money, but he hasn't returned it yet.
zh: 我借给他一些钱，但他还没还。

en: Our meeting like that is probably the kind of thing that only happens once.
zh: 我们那样的相遇大概是一辈子只有一次的事情。

en: Don't get mixed up with those people.
zh: 不要和那些人混在一起。

en: Are you acquainted with the man?
zh: 你认识那个人吗？

en: He's so moody I have trouble keeping up with him.
zh: 他情绪变化太快，我很难跟上。

en: He's the type who doesn't worry about details.
zh: 他是那种不拘小节的人。

en: Those men are of a generation.
zh: 那些男人是同一代人。

en: I often go fishing with them.
zh: 我经常和他们一起去钓鱼。

en: I wonder who they are.
zh: 我想知道他们是谁。

en: They say that I'm an old woman.
zh: 他们说我是个老太婆。

en: They live in the house opposite to ours.
zh: 他们住在我们对面的房子里。

en: They are just going to the store over there.
zh: 他们只是去那边商店。

en: They must have been overcome by the recent disasters.
zh: 他们一定是受不了最近的灾难了。

en: Their baby is able to walk already.
zh: 他们的宝宝已经会走路了。

en: Their hut is situated in the valley.
zh: 他们的茅屋坐落在山谷里。

en: Their trouble stems from a trifling matter.
zh: 他们的麻烦源于一件小事。

en: I wanted to show them my appreciation.
zh: 我想向他们表达我的感谢。

en: Will you help me give out the programs to those people?
zh: 你能帮我把节目单发给那些人吗？

en: It was rather easy for them.
zh: 对他们来说相当容易。

en: I feel uncomfortable with those people.
zh: 我和那些人在一起感觉不舒服。

en: May they live long!
zh: 祝他们长寿！

en: Are those the people you saw yesterday?
zh: 那些是你昨天看到的人吗？

en: While they were away on holiday, their neighbours looked after the dog.
zh: 他们度假期间，他们的邻居照顾了那条狗。

en: As soon as they return, I will telephone you.
zh: 他们一回来，我就给你打电话。

en: I hope neither of them was injured in the crash.
zh: 我希望他们俩都没在车祸中受伤。

en: I don't know who that man is.
zh: 我不知道那个人是谁。

en: I don't know who the man is.
zh: 我不知道那个人是谁。

en: No one informed me of his failure.
zh: 没有人通知我他失败了。

en: He cannot be a poet.
zh: 他不可能是个诗人。

en: He is directly above me.
zh: 他就在我的正上方。

en: That's the woman who wants to see you.
zh: 那就是想见你的那位女士。

en: How long is it since you heard from him?
zh: 你有多久没收到他的消息了？

en: What happened to him?
zh: 他怎么了？

en: I think it strange that he should lose his temper over that.
zh: 我觉得他因为那件事发脾气很奇怪。

en: He reminds me of his father when he speaks.
zh: 他说话的时候让我想起了他的父亲。

en: Without him our company would cease to function.
zh: 没有他，我们公司就会停止运作。

en: That is the American about whom we talked yesterday.
zh: 那就是我们昨天谈论的那位美国人。

en: I heard she brushed him off, saying "Let's just be friends."
zh: 我听说她拒绝了他，说“我们还是做朋友吧”。

en: That guy always goes over people's heads to get what he wants.
zh: 那家伙总是越级汇报以达到他的目的。

en: Who is that gentleman?
zh: 那位先生是谁？

en: How hard he works!
zh: 他工作多么努力啊！

en: That gentleman must be a doctor.
zh: 那位先生一定是位医生。

en: How did you come to know that gentleman?
zh: 你是怎么认识那位先生的？

en: That new company could flatten the competition.
zh: 那家新公司可能会击垮竞争对手。

en: That new movie was a bummer.
zh: 那部新电影真让人失望。

en: The food is sensational at that new restaurant.
zh: 那家新餐厅的食物太棒了。

en: Please let me off on this side of that traffic light.
zh: 请让我在那个红绿灯的这边下车。

en: I was at a loss what to do on that occasion.
zh: 当时我不知所措。

en: That castle is beautiful.
zh: 那座城堡真漂亮。

en: That castle was built in ancient times.
zh: 那座城堡建于古代。

en: The star which shines up there is Jupiter.
zh: 在那裡閃耀的星星是木星。

en: That boy is his brother.
zh: 那個男孩是他的兄弟。

en: That boy has good brains.
zh: 那個男孩很聰明。

en: The young boy got sticky fingers when he walked into stores.
zh: 那個小男孩走進商店時，手腳不乾淨。

en: That boy is running.
zh: 那個男孩在跑步。

en: The boy tried moving the heavy sofa.
zh: 那個男孩試圖移動那個沉重的沙發。

en: That boy has black hair.
zh: 那個男孩有黑色的頭髮。

en: The young man is a handsome figure.
zh: 那個年輕人是一個英俊的人物。

en: That boy is speaking English.
zh: 那個男孩在說英語。

en: That boy often breaks our windows with a ball.
zh: 那個男孩經常用球打破我們的窗戶。

en: Is that boy Tom or Ben?
zh: 那個男孩是湯姆還是本？

en: That boy is Tony, isn't he?
zh: 那個男孩是托尼，不是嗎？

en: The boy seems to be coming in this direction.
zh: 那個男孩似乎正朝這個方向走來。

en: That boy hit her child on purpose.
zh: 那個男孩故意打了她的孩子。

en: That boy's name is Shintaro Wada.
zh: 那個男孩的名字是和田慎太郎。

en: That boy's hair is black.
zh: 那個男孩的頭髮是黑色的。

en: Those boys are in the first flush of youth.
zh: 那些男孩正值青春年華。

en: How lazy those boys are!
zh: 那些男孩有多懶啊！

en: Those boys are not good at speaking to these girls.
zh: 那些男孩不擅長和這些女孩說話。

en: That girl is certainly a hard worker.
zh: 那個女孩肯定是一個努力工作的人。

en: That girl is more cute than beautiful.
zh: 那個女孩比漂亮更可愛。

en: Who's that girl?
zh: 那個女孩是誰？

en: That girl is under the delusion that she is a princess.
zh: 那個女孩妄想自己是個公主。

en: That girl's eyes are blue.
zh: 那個女孩的眼睛是藍色的。

en: The small retail outlet is only a front for a much larger entity.
zh: 那個小型零售店只是一個更大的實體的幌子。

en: That path is apt to be muddy after rain.
zh: 下雨之后那条路很可能泥泞。

en: That novel was widely read.
zh: 那本小说广为流传。

en: That primary school has a strong soccer team.
zh: 那所小学有一支很强的足球队。

en: That hut is crawling with lizards and insects.
zh: 那个小屋里爬满了蜥蜴和昆虫。

en: That small star is brightest.
zh: 那颗小星星最亮。

en: That little girl is my sister's friend.
zh: 那个小女孩是我姐姐的朋友。

en: That small one is also mine.
zh: 那个小的也是我的。

en: I'd still be spinning my wheels if I hadn't gotten that scholarship.
zh: 如果我没有得到那笔奖学金，我可能还在原地打转。

en: The merchant deals in silk goods.
zh: 那个商人经营丝绸制品。

en: That actress is as beautiful as ever.
zh: 那位女演员一如既往地美丽。

en: I think that actress is one of the most beautiful women on earth.
zh: 我认为那位女演员是世界上最美丽的女人之一。

en: That actress is the shining star in the company.
zh: 那位女演员是公司里一颗闪耀的明星。

en: That woman is proud rather than vain.
zh: 那位女士是骄傲而不是虚荣。

en: That poor lady is disabled.
zh: 那位可怜的女士残疾了。

en: Who is that woman?
zh: 那位女士是谁？

en: The lady really flipped out when she learned she had won a million dollars.
zh: 那位女士得知自己中了百万美元大奖时，真的吓坏了。

en: The woman served her purpose.
zh: 那位女士完成了她的使命。

en: She is quite coquettish.
zh: 她非常爱卖弄风情。

en: She came damn late.
zh: 她来得太晚了。

en: She is always finding fault with other people.
zh: 她总是挑别人的毛病。

en: That woman is much older than I.
zh: 那位女士比我年长得多。

en: That woman will be his wife.
zh: 那位女士将成为他的妻子。

en: That woman has two bags.
zh: 那位女士有两个包。

en: Look at the girls.
zh: 看看那些女孩。

en: The young woman didn't know her boyfriend was loaded.
zh: 那位年轻女子不知道她的男朋友很有钱。

en: That girl is arrogant because of her beauty.
zh: 那个女孩因为她的美貌而傲慢自大。

en: That girl is far from being shy.
zh: 那个女孩一点也不害羞。

en: I wonder who that girl is.
zh: 我想知道那个女孩是谁。

en: That girl is a true blue country singer.
zh: 那个女孩是个地道的乡村歌手。

en: The young girl wanted to be a star of the silver screen.
zh: 那个小女孩想成为电影明星。

en: How sad that girl looks!
zh: 那个女孩看起来多么悲伤啊！

en: That girl looks very pretty.
zh: 那个女孩看起来非常漂亮。

en: The girl had grown up without any money and when she married she became a spendthrift.
zh: 那个女孩从小就没钱，结婚后就变得挥金如土。

en: Which of those girls do you like?
zh: 你喜欢那些女孩中的哪一个？

en: Are you interested in that girl?
zh: 你对那个女孩感兴趣吗？

en: The girl may well think ill you.
zh: 那个女孩很可能会对你产生不好的印象。

en: How that woman runs on!
zh: 那个女人真能说啊！

en: You don't have to be very old to remember that event.
zh: 你不需要很老才能记得那件事。

en: That publishing company is in the black.
zh: 那家出版社盈利了。

en: Can you manage to carry that heavy suitcase by yourself?
zh: 你能自己搬动那个沉重的行李箱吗？

en: That religious cult has got some pretty off the wall ideas.
zh: 那个宗教邪教有一些非常离谱的想法。

en: That kind of dress is now in fashion.
zh: 那种款式的裙子现在很流行。

en: Those young men are independent of their parents.
zh: 那些年轻人经济独立，不依赖父母。

en: That young man is very keen on cycling.
zh: 那个年轻人非常喜欢骑自行车。

en: That young man is our teacher.
zh: 那个年轻人是我们的老师。

en: The agent built up the young singer.
zh: 经纪人捧红了那个年轻歌手。

en: Are you going to buy that auto?
zh: 你要买那辆汽车吗？

en: That car is hers.
zh: 那辆车是她的。

en: That car is a real beauty.
zh: 那辆车真漂亮。

en: That car is mine.
zh: 那辆车是我的。

en: That car is too expensive for me to buy.
zh: 那辆车太贵了，我买不起。

en: That car is the best deal for your money.
zh: 那辆车是最划算的。

en: You seem to have had that car for years.
zh: 你好像已经开了那辆车很多年了。

en: That car is the most beautiful of the three.
zh: 那辆车是三辆车中最漂亮的。

en: That car salesman was a pretty off the wall kind of guy.
zh: 那个汽车销售员是个相当古怪的人。

en: That president's secretary is always prim.
zh: 那位总统的秘书总是很拘谨。

en: The president is difficult to approach.
zh: 那位总统很难接近。

en: There was a problem with the architecture of that company's new computer. They're going through a recall frenzy right now.
zh: 那家公司的新电脑的架构有问题。他们现在正在经历召回狂潮。

en: Please take a look at that picture.
zh: 请看一下那张照片。

en: Where's that picture hiding?
zh: 那张照片藏在哪里？

en: That copy differs from the original.
zh: 那个副本与原件不同。

en: I never see that play without crying.
zh: 我每次看那部剧都会哭。

en: That bicycle belongs to our school.
zh: 那辆自行车是属于我们学校的。

en: The chances of success are greater if the business man knows the ropes, and also has more funds at his disposal.
zh: 如果商人熟悉内情，并且拥有更多的资金，成功的机会就更大。

en: The price of that bicycle was too high.
zh: 那辆自行车的价格太高了。

en: I wish I had been kind to her then.
zh: 我希望当时我对她好一点。

en: I wish I had obeyed his directions.
zh: 我希望我当时听了他的指示。

en: I was reading a novel then.
zh: 我当时正在读小说。

en: If he had taken my advice then, he would be a rich man now.
zh: 如果他当时听了我的建议，现在他就会是个有钱人了。

en: Is that clock working?
zh: 那个钟在走吗？

en: At the time I managed to make myself understood in English.
zh: 当时我设法用英语表达清楚了自己的意思。

en: That clock is one minute fast.
zh: 那个钟快了一分钟。

en: I wish I had been with you then.
zh: 我希望当时我和你在一起。

en: I have not seen him since.
zh: 自从那以后我就没见过他了。

en: If he had worked hard at that time, he would have succeeded.
zh: 如果他当时努力工作，他就会成功了。

en: You know, I had a lot of fun.
zh: 你知道吗，我玩得很开心。

en: Were you sober at that time?
zh: 你当时是清醒的吗？

en: I cannot express how pleased I was then.
zh: 我无法表达我当时有多高兴。

en: I wish I had treated the girl more kindly at that time.
zh: 我希望我当时对那个女孩更好一些。

en: If she had married you, she would be happy now.
zh: 如果她嫁给你，她现在会很幸福。

en: His health has declined since the accident.
zh: 自从那次事故后，他的健康状况就下降了。

en: That accident brought home to me the power of nature.
zh: 那次事故让我真正体会到了大自然的力量。

en: That accident is a good illustration of his carelessness.
zh: 那次事故很好地说明了他的粗心大意。

en: She was never completely free from pain after the accident.
zh: 自从那次事故后，她从未完全摆脱痛苦。

en: There is something mysterious about the accident.
zh: 那次事故有些神秘。

en: Do you know what time that accident happened?
zh: 你知道那次事故是什么时候发生的吗？

en: Who will hear the case?
zh: 谁将审理这个案件？

en: That incident was a black mark against the president.
zh: 那件事是总统的一个污点。

en: That incident is printed on my mind.
zh: 那件事深深地印在我的脑海里。

en: That branch is affiliated to the miners' union.
zh: 那个分部隶属于矿工工会。

en: The children thought that their parents were made of money.
zh: 孩子们以为他们的父母很有钱。

en: The child captivates everyone with his sunny smile.
zh: 那个孩子阳光般的笑容迷住了所有人。

en: The child came near being drowned.
zh: 那个孩子差点被淹死。

en: Those children use bad words.
zh: 那些孩子说脏话。

en: Those children are waiting for their mother.
zh: 那些孩子正在等他们的妈妈。

en: I'm against us forcing the child to go to cram school.
zh: 我反对我们强迫孩子去上补习班。

en: You shouldn't indulge that child. It will make him very selfish.
zh: 你不应该溺爱那个孩子。这会让他变得非常自私。

en: He will soon be past playing with toys.
zh: 他很快就不再玩玩具了。

en: That child is full of mischief.
zh: 那个孩子很淘气。

en: He is a slim child.
zh: 他是个瘦小的孩子。

en: She was named Kate after her mother.
zh: 她以她母亲的名字命名为凯特。

en: He is very mean to me.
zh: 他对我很刻薄。

en: The boy isn't as bad as he seemed.
zh: 那个男孩没有他看起来那么坏。

en: I wonder what ever will become of the child.
zh: 我想知道那个孩子将来会怎么样。

en: The boy often runs errands.
zh: 那个男孩经常跑腿。

en: The kid looks blank.
zh: 那孩子看起来茫然。

en: What a little imp he is!
zh: 他真是个小淘气鬼！

en: What a nuisance that child is!
zh: 那个孩子真是个麻烦！

en: That boy is a handful.
zh: 那个男孩真让人头疼。

en: That child is impossible.
zh: 那个孩子简直没法管。

en: She is always smiling.
zh: 她总是面带微笑。

en: That child is always fretting.
zh: 那个孩子总是忧心忡忡。

en: The child is dirty.
zh: 那个孩子很脏。

en: That child can count to twenty.
zh: 那个孩子能数到二十。

en: You have to allow for the boy's age.
zh: 你得考虑到那个男孩的年龄。

en: The mother of that child is an announcer.
zh: 那个孩子的母亲是播音员。

en: That child is a headache.
zh: 那个孩子真让人头疼。

en: The child puts adults to shame.
zh: 那个孩子让大人都感到羞愧。

en: That girl just drives me wild.
zh: 那个女孩真让我抓狂。

en: The kid is a pain in the neck.
zh: 那孩子真是个眼中钉。

en: That boy of mine! He'll eat me out of house and home!
zh: 我那个儿子啊！他会把我吃穷的！

en: What were you doing when she came?
zh: 她来的时候你在做什么？

en: If that boy had not been killed in the traffic accident, he would be a college student now.
zh: 如果那个男孩没有在交通事故中丧生，他现在应该是一名大学生了。

en: That child's constant screaming gives me gray hairs.
zh: 那个孩子不停的尖叫声都让我长白头发了。

en: I think that girl cut her hair to give herself a new look.
zh: 我觉得那个女孩剪头发是为了让自己焕然一新。

en: How well that girl skis!
zh: 那个女孩滑雪滑得真好！

en: The sisters are quite unlike.
zh: 姐妹俩截然不同。

en: I did that work on the orders of my boss.
zh: 我是在老板的指示下完成那项工作的。

en: The job offer still stands.
zh: 那份工作邀请仍然有效。

en: What's the name of the mountain range?
zh: 那座山脉叫什么名字？

en: Look at that mountain.
zh: 看那座山。

en: That mountain is covered with snow.
zh: 那座山被雪覆盖着。

en: The mountain used to send out clouds of smoke.
zh: 那座山过去常常冒出烟雾。

en: That mountain is in the clouds.
zh: 那座山在云里。

en: How high mountain that is!
zh: 那座山真高啊！

en: How high is that mountain?
zh: 那座山有多高？

en: That mountain is five times as high as this one.
zh: 那座山是这座山的五倍高。

en: That mountain is about three thousand meters high.
zh: 那座山大约三千米高。

en: The top of that mountain is flat.
zh: 那座山的山顶是平的。

en: It is dangerous to climb that mountain.
zh: 攀登那座山很危险。

en: You need good equipment to climb that mountain.
zh: 你需要好的装备才能攀登那座山。

en: We are going to climb that mountain.
zh: 我们要去爬那座山。

en: Are you done with that magazine?
zh: 你看完那本杂志了吗？

en: I found nothing interesting in that magazine.
zh: 我在那本杂志里没找到什么有趣的东西。

en: I cannot put up with all that noise.
zh: 我无法忍受所有的噪音。

en: The writer has an excellent style.
zh: 这位作家文笔极佳。

en: Six months have passed since the author was killed in an accident.
zh: 自从作者在一次事故中丧生已经过去六个月了。

en: The confidence man and his blonde call girl make a perfect match in enraging his landlady.
zh: 那个骗子和他金发女郎的组合，激怒了他的房东，真是天生一对。

en: If only I had listened to my parents!
zh: 要是我当时听了父母的话就好了！

en: There was hatred between us then.
zh: 那时我们之间充满仇恨。

en: We were younger then.
zh: 那时我们还年轻。

en: Look at those black clouds.
zh: 看看那些黑云。

en: Who is the gentleman all dressed in black?
zh: 那位全身穿黑衣服的绅士是谁？

en: That black one is mine.
zh: 那个黑的是我的。

en: Look at those black clouds. It is going to rain.
zh: 看看那些黑云。要下雨了。

en: Is that black bag yours?
zh: 那个黑色的包是你的吗？

en: There seems no need to help that country.
zh: 似乎没有必要帮助那个国家。

en: That country is five times as large as Japan.
zh: 那个国家是日本的五倍大。

en: That country abounds in oil.
zh: 那个国家盛产石油。

en: That country broke off diplomatic relations with the neighboring countries.
zh: 那个国家与邻国断绝了外交关系。

en: That country's economic situation changes from day to day.
zh: 那个国家的经济形势日新月异。

en: That country is where individuality counts.
zh: 那个国家重视个性。

en: It is impossible to tell what will happen in that country.
zh: 不可能知道那个国家会发生什么。

en: In that country I was a foreigner and was treated as such.
zh: 在那个国家，我是个外国人，并受到了那样的待遇。

en: Look at that high mountain.
zh: 看看那座高山。

en: That high mountain is Mt. Tsukuba.
zh: 那座高山是筑波山。

en: Look at that tall building.
zh: 看看那栋高楼。

en: What's that tall building?
zh: 那栋高楼是什么？

en: There is a library at the back of that tall building.
zh: 在那栋高楼的后面有一个图书馆。

en: It's heart-warming to see that happy old couple.
zh: 看到那对幸福的老夫妇，心里感到很温暖。

en: They make used cooking oil into soap at that factory.
zh: 他们在那个工厂里把废食用油制成肥皂。

en: That candidate stands for free trade.
zh: 那位候选人支持自由贸易。

en: What happened at that crossing?
zh: 那个十字路口发生了什么事？

en: That fox must have killed the hen.
zh: 那只狐狸一定是杀了那只母鸡。

en: That lake looks like the sea.
zh: 那个湖看起来像大海。

en: Cut down that dead tree, or it will fall down on your house.
zh: 把那棵枯树砍倒，不然它会倒在你的房子上。

en: That old book is a real find.
zh: 那本旧书真是个宝贝。

en: That ancient ruin was once a shrine.
zh: 那处古老的遗址曾经是个神殿。

en: Those old laws were all done away with.
zh: 那些旧法律都被废除了。

en: That old bridge is anything but safe.
zh: 那座旧桥一点也不安全。

en: That old house is thought to be haunted.
zh: 那栋老房子被认为是闹鬼的。

en: They say that old house is haunted.
zh: 他们说那栋老房子闹鬼。

en: Where did you pick up those old coins?
zh: 你在哪里捡到那些旧硬币的？

en: For a healthy cheerful guy like that to get sick is like the devil getting sunstroke. Everyone is talking about it.
zh: 像他那样一个健康开朗的人竟然生病了，简直就像魔鬼中了暑一样。每个人都在谈论这件事。

en: That dog is too dangerous to be left loose.
zh: 那条狗太危险了，不能放任不管。

en: Don't let that dog come near me!
zh: 别让那条狗靠近我！

en: How fast that dog runs!
zh: 那条狗跑得真快！

en: You should do away with that dog.
zh: 你应该把那条狗处理掉。

en: How old that dog is!
zh: 那条狗真老啊！

en: That dog runs very fast.
zh: 那条狗跑得非常快。

en: That dog has a short tail.
zh: 那条狗的尾巴很短。

en: That dog is exactly twice the size of this one.
zh: 那条狗的体型正好是这条狗的两倍。

en: Is that dog male or female?
zh: 那条狗是公的还是母的？

en: How old is that dog?
zh: 那条狗多大了？

en: I was bitten in the leg by that dog.
zh: 我被那条狗咬到了腿。

en: Keep away from the dog.
zh: 离那条狗远点。

en: How can we get the ball away from the dog?
zh: 我们怎样才能把球从那条狗那里拿回来？

en: That dog has been barking 'Ruff-ruff-ruff-ruff!' all day long.
zh: 那条狗一整天都在叫“汪汪汪汪！”。

en: Look at that building. Is it a temple?
zh: 看看那栋建筑。是寺庙吗？

en: Look at that building.
zh: 看看那栋建筑。

en: That building is our school.
zh: 那栋楼是我们的学校。

en: What's that building?
zh: 那栋楼是什么？

en: Who is the man standing in front of the building?
zh: 站在楼前的那个人是谁？

en: Please let me off in front of that building.
zh: 请在那栋楼前让我下车。

en: That architect builds very modern houses.
zh: 那位建筑师建造非常现代化的房子。

en: The matter has not been settled yet.
zh: 那件事还没有解决。

en: That plan still needed some finishing touches.
zh: 那个计划还需要一些润色。

en: That theater has a foreign film festival every other month.
zh: 那家剧院每隔一个月都有外国电影节。

en: They are putting P on at that theater.
zh: 他们正在那家剧院上演P剧。

en: That guard tends to do everything by the book.
zh: 那位警卫倾向于一切都按章办事。

en: That plan came to nothing.
zh: 那个计划落空了。

en: Those shoes do not go with the suit.
zh: 那双鞋和这套西装不搭。

en: That bank was held up twice.
zh: 那家银行被抢劫过两次。

en: The bank was held up a week ago.
zh: 那家银行一周前被抢劫了。

en: He says he's related to that rich family.
zh: 他说他和那个富裕的家庭有亲戚关系。

en: That bridge isn't long.
zh: 那座桥不长。

en: That bridge is made of stone.
zh: 那座桥是石头做的。

en: That bridge is very beautiful.
zh: 那座桥非常漂亮。

en: How long that bridge is!
zh: 那座桥有多长啊！

en: How wonderful that bridge is!
zh: 那座桥多么壮观啊！

en: How long is that bridge?
zh: 那座桥有多长？

en: That bridge is half as long as this one.
zh: 那座桥只有这座桥的一半长。

en: That bridge is anything but safe.
zh: 那座桥一点也不安全。

en: How old is that church?
zh: 那座教堂有多少年历史了？

en: That church organization takes in refugees.
zh: 那个教会组织收容难民。

en: That textbook is out of date.
zh: 那本教科书已经过时了。

en: It's fun to watch the race.
zh: 看比赛真有趣。

en: They sell live fish at the fish store.
zh: 他们在鱼店卖活鱼。

en: What is that huge building?
zh: 那栋巨大的建筑是什么？

en: Look at those cattle.
zh: 看看那些牛。

en: There used to be a great castle on that hill.
zh: 那座山上曾经有一座很棒的城堡。

en: That cafe has a pretty good breakfast special.
zh: 那家咖啡馆的早餐特价很不错。

en: My heart aches for those starving children.
zh: 我为那些饥饿的孩子们感到心痛。

en: I have to catch that train.
zh: 我必须赶上那趟火车。

en: Look at that brilliant star.
zh: 看看那颗闪耀的星星。

en: Is that machine still usable?
zh: 那台机器还能用吗？

en: I don't know how to get along with those difficult people.
zh: 我不知道如何与那些难相处的人相处。

en: It was Mr Smith that told me how to use that machine.
zh: 是史密斯先生告诉我如何使用那台机器的。

en: That comedian is very funny.
zh: 那位喜剧演员非常有趣。

en: That comic's jokes are all old hat and we've heard them before.
zh: 那位喜剧演员的笑话都很老套，我们以前都听过了。

en: I have seen that face somewhere before.
zh: 我以前好像在哪里见过那张脸。

en: That nurse is a real angel to her patients.
zh: 那位护士对她的病人来说真是个天使。

en: That nurse is very kind and polite.
zh: 那位护士非常善良和礼貌。

en: That bag is mine.
zh: 那个包是我的。

en: I may have caught cold on that cold night.
zh: 我可能在那个寒冷的夜晚着凉了。

en: I want that bag.
zh: 我想要那个包。

en: Don't call that student a fool.
zh: 不要叫那个学生傻瓜。

en: The student is likely to do well on this coming mid-term exam.
zh: 这个学生很可能在即将到来的期中考试中表现出色。

en: That student is very active.
zh: 那个学生非常活跃。

en: Those students work hard, don't they?
zh: 那些学生很努力，不是吗？

en: Those college students give me a bad headache.
zh: 那些大学生真让我头疼。

en: That student actually got full marks in English.
zh: 那个学生竟然英语考了满分。

en: That scholar made a great scientific discovery.
zh: 那位学者做出了伟大的科学发现。

en: That school is going to do away with uniforms.
zh: 那所学校要取消校服了。

en: His abilities were not appreciated in that school.
zh: 他的能力在那所学校没有得到赏识。

en: They teach Chinese at that school.
zh: 那所学校教中文。

en: They adopted a new method of teaching English in that school.
zh: 那所学校采用了新的英语教学方法。

en: There used to be a bookstore on that corner.
zh: 那个角落以前有家书店。

en: How fluently that foreigner speaks Japanese!
zh: 那个外国人日语说得真流利！

en: That painting is a masterpiece of impressionist art.
zh: 那幅画是印象派艺术的杰作。

en: Hang that picture on the wall.
zh: 把那幅画挂在墙上。

en: What do you imagine when you see that picture?
zh: 你看到那幅画时会想象到什么？

en: Look at that picture.
zh: 看看那幅画。

en: I want to take a better look at that painting. I want to stand closer.
zh: 我想好好看看那幅画。我想站近一点。

en: Have a look at that picture.
zh: 看看那幅画。

en: That painting is beautiful, and so is this one.
zh: 那幅画很漂亮，这幅也是。

en: That painting is a copy.
zh: 那幅画是复制品。

en: That painting has started to grow on me.
zh: 我开始喜欢上那幅画了。

en: That gray building?
zh: 那栋灰色的建筑？

en: That broken vase is my grandfather's.
zh: 那个破花瓶是我爷爷的。

en: That company just put up a web page.
zh: 那家公司刚建了一个网页。

en: That company went bankrupt.
zh: 那家公司破产了。

en: That outfit is running a fly-by-night operation.
zh: 那家公司在搞不正当经营。

en: The company stopped losing money.
zh: 那家公司不再亏损了。

en: The company is losing money.
zh: 那家公司正在亏损。

en: That company puts out a magazine, doesn't it?
zh: 那家公司有出版杂志，是吧？

en: Everybody in that company is either a vice-president or a senior vice-president; they're all chiefs and no Indians.
zh: 那家公司的每个人不是副总裁就是高级副总裁；他们都是领导，没有干活的人。

en: That company hires people without regard to race, religion, or nationality.
zh: 那家公司招聘员工不考虑种族、宗教或国籍。

en: The people in the office will never agree.
zh: 办公室里的人永远不会达成一致。

en: The president of that company has an ace up her sleeve.
zh: 那家公司的总裁留了一手。

en: The price of the stock of that company will not come down.
zh: 那家公司的股票价格不会下跌。

en: I'm not satisfied with that company's service.
zh: 我对那家公司的服务不满意。

en: Our transactions with that firm have continued unbroken since my father's generation.
zh: 自从我父亲那一代起，我们与那家公司的交易就一直没有中断过。

en: A contract with that company is worth next to nothing.
zh: 与那家公司签订的合同几乎一文不值。

en: That flower smells sweet.
zh: 那朵花闻起来很香。

en: What's that flower?
zh: 那是什么花？

en: That Kabuki actor is very popular with young people.
zh: 那位歌舞伎演员很受年轻人欢迎。

en: How beautiful that flower is!
zh: 那朵花真漂亮！

en: That flower has a powerful smell.
zh: 那朵花气味很浓。

en: The singer no longer has a future.
zh: 那位歌手已经没有未来了。

en: That singer is very popular with people in general.
zh: 那位歌手很受大众欢迎。

en: I can not hear that song without thinking of my high school days.
zh: 我一听到那首歌就会想起我的高中时代。

en: I never hear that song without remembering my high school days.
zh: 我每次听到那首歌都会想起我的高中时代。

en: That song's bound to be a hit.
zh: 那首歌肯定会大受欢迎。

en: That song is very popular with young people.
zh: 那首歌很受年轻人欢迎。

en: I like the slow rhythm of that song.
zh: 我喜欢那首歌缓慢的节奏。

en: I can't get that song out of my head.
zh: 我脑海里一直挥之不去那首歌。

en: Have you ever heard that song sung in French?
zh: 你听过用法语演唱那首歌吗？

en: Those scientists are the cream of the crop.
zh: 那些科学家是精英中的精英。

en: I regret not having bought that house.
zh: 我后悔没有买那栋房子。

en: Look at that house.
zh: 看看那栋房子。

en: That house is famous.
zh: 那栋房子很有名。

en: That house belongs to him.
zh: 那栋房子是他的。

en: That house is big.
zh: 那栋房子很大。

en: That house is very small.
zh: 那栋房子非常小。

en: She wears the trousers in that house.
zh: 在那栋房子里，她说了算。

en: That house belongs to me.
zh: 那栋房子是我的。

en: That little house looks just like the little house my grandmother lived in when she was a little girl, on a hill covered with daisies and apple trees growing around.
zh: 那栋小房子看起来就像我奶奶小时候住的小房子，在长满雏菊的山坡上，周围种着苹果树。

en: That house is built of bricks.
zh: 那栋房子是用砖砌的。

en: They still haven't found a buyer for that house.
zh: 他们还没为那栋房子找到买家。

en: That house cried for a coat of paint.
zh: 那栋房子看起来很需要粉刷一下。

en: The house is very old. It needs repairing before you sell it.
zh: 这房子很旧了。 卖掉之前需要修理一下。

en: That house is much better than this.
zh: 那栋房子比这栋好多了。

en: The prosperity of the family dates from the Great War.
zh: 这个家庭的兴旺是从第一次世界大战开始的。

en: The house is haunted.
zh: 那栋房子闹鬼。

en: Do I have to fix up to go to their house?
zh: 我去他们家需要打扮一下吗？

en: Two families live in that house.
zh: 那栋房子里住着两户人家。

en: There appears to be a party in that house.
zh: 那栋房子里好像在开派对。

en: I wish I could buy that house cheap.
zh: 我希望我能便宜地买下那栋房子。

en: That music gets on his nerves.
zh: 那个音乐让他心烦。

en: That noise is almost driving me mad.
zh: 那个噪音快把我逼疯了。

en: What was that noise?
zh: 那是什么声音？

en: I've triumphed over that coward.
zh: 我战胜了那个懦夫。

en: Look at that cat on the roof.
zh: 看看屋顶上的那只猫。

en: That yellow sweater costs twice as much as this blue one.
zh: 那件黄色毛衣比这件蓝色毛衣贵一倍。

en: That chimney is very high.
zh: 那个烟囱真高。

en: Look at that smoke. That building must be on fire.
zh: 你看那烟，那栋楼一定是着火了。

en: Look at that smoke.
zh: 你看那烟。

en: Look at that boy who is swimming.
zh: 你看那个正在游泳的男孩。

en: You should have seen the movie.
zh: 你应该看过那部电影。

en: Seeing that movie is something like taking a trip to India.
zh: 看那部电影就像去了一趟印度。

en: That movie was amusing.
zh: 那部电影很有趣。

en: They say that the movie is an interesting one.
zh: 他们说那部电影很有意思。

en: That movie was extremely interesting.
zh: 那部电影非常有趣。

en: That movie is worth seeing.
zh: 那部电影值得一看。

en: This movie is worth seeing again.
zh: 这部电影值得再看一遍。

en: That movie was really moving.
zh: 那部电影非常感人。

en: That movie was shown on TV.
zh: 那部电影在电视上播放过。

en: How did you like that movie?
zh: 你觉得那部电影怎么样？

en: What I remember most about that movie is the last scene.
zh: 关于那部电影，我印象最深的是最后一个场景。

en: That movie stinks!
zh: 那部电影太烂了！

en: Look at those clouds! It's going to rain.
zh: 你看那些云！要下雨了。

en: Look at those clouds.
zh: 你看那些云。

en: That cloud is in the shape of a fish.
zh: 那朵云的形状像一条鱼。

en: That cloud bodes rain.
zh: 那朵云预示着要下雨。

en: When the family won the million dollar sweepstakes, they were in the fat city.
zh: 当这家人赢得百万美元彩票时，他们就过上了富裕的生活。

en: That doctor may cure him of his cancer.
zh: 那位医生可能会治好他的癌症。

en: The doctor is gentle with his patients.
zh: 这位医生对他的病人很温柔。

en: Look at the big shot.
zh: 你看那个大人物。

en: That naughty boy annoys me by his pranks.
zh: 那个淘气的男孩的恶作剧让我很恼火。

en: That straw catches fire easily.
zh: 那根稻草很容易着火。

en: That painting by Rembrandt is a work of art.
zh: 伦勃朗的那幅画是一件艺术品。

en: That restaurant prepares two thousand meals every day.
zh: 那家餐厅每天准备两千份饭菜。

en: They serve terrible food at that restaurant.
zh: 那家餐厅的食物很难吃。

en: That restaurant serves excellent food.
zh: 那家餐厅的食物非常好吃。

en: They give good service at that restaurant.
zh: 那家餐厅的服务很好。

en: They serve delicious food at that restaurant.
zh: 那家餐厅的食物很美味。

en: The restaurant is always packed.
zh: 那家餐厅总是挤满了人。

en: Did you have a good meal at that restaurant?
zh: 你在那家餐厅吃得好吗？

en: Let's not go to that restaurant again.
zh: 我们以后别再去那家餐厅了。

en: You can get good food for a modest sum at the restaurant.
zh: 在那家餐厅，你可以花不多的钱吃到好吃的食物。

en: I don't recommend eating in that restaurant. The food is awful.
zh: 我不推荐在那家餐厅吃饭。食物太糟糕了。

en: They serve wonderful Chinese at that restaurant.
zh: 那家餐厅的中国菜做得非常好。

en: I bought that record in this store.
zh: 我是在这家店买的那个唱片。

en: The race was fixed.
zh: 那场比赛是作弊的。

en: The airport shuttle will take you to Tokyo International Airport.
zh: 机场班车会送你到东京国际机场。

en: The love letter ought to have reached her.
zh: 那封情书应该已经寄到她那里了。

en: Is that radio program still on the air?
zh: 那个广播节目还在播出吗？

en: I wish they would turn off the radio.
zh: 我希望他们把收音机关掉。

en: You must succeed after such efforts.
zh: 经过这样的努力，你一定要成功。

en: It was silly of you to make such a mistake.
zh: 你犯这样的错误真是太傻了。

en: Such a disaster won't come again in my time.
zh: 在我有生之年，不会再发生这样的灾难了。

en: Your methods are totally alien to mine.
zh: 你的方法和我的完全不同。

en: Where has that memo got to?
zh: 那份备忘录去哪儿了？

en: Was all of that milk drunk?
zh: 所有的牛奶都喝了吗？
